description.original: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!
description.translation: Supercharge your canvas experience! Create presentations, flowcharts and more!

dict.Notice(\"Reload obsidian to apply the ch: Notice("Reload obsidian to apply the changes.")
dict.Notice(\"No start node found. Please mar: Notice("No start node found. Please mark a node as a start node trough the popup menu.")
dict.description: \"General settings of the A: description: "General settings of the Advanced Canvas plugin."
dict.description: \"The type of node that wil: description: "The type of node that will be created when double clicking on the canvas."
dict.description: \"When enabled, new nodes w: description: "When enabled, new nodes will be aligned to the grid."
dict.description: \"The default width of a te: description: "The default width of a text node."
dict.description: \"The default height of a t: description: "The default height of a text node."
dict.description: \"The default width of a fi: description: "The default width of a file node."
dict.description: \"The default height of a f: description: "The default height of a file node."
dict.description: \"The minimum size of a nod: description: "The minimum size of a node."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the font si: description: "When enabled, the font size of e.g. group node titles and edge labels will not increase when zooming out."
dict.description: \"Combine all style attribu: description: "Combine all style attributes of Advanced Canvas in a single dropdown."
dict.description: \"Style your nodes with dif: description: "Style your nodes with different shapes and borders."
dict.description: \"Add custom style settings: description: "Add custom style settings for nodes. (Go to GitHub for more information)"
dict.description: \"Style your edges with dif: description: "Style your edges with different path styles."
dict.description: \"Add custom style settings: description: "Add custom style settings for edges. (Go to GitHub for more information)"
dict.description: \"The default line directio: description: "The default line direction of an edge."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the edge st: description: "When enabled, the edge style will be updated while dragging an edge."
dict.description: 'When enabled, the arrow wi: description: 'When enabled, the arrow will be rotated to the direction of the edge if the pathfinding method is set to "Direct".'
dict.description: \"The resolution of the gri: description: "The resolution of the grid when using the A* path style. The lower the value, the more precise the path will be. But it will also take longer to calculate."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the A* path: description: "When enabled, the A* path style will be rounded."
dict.description: \"Add more commands to the: description: "Add more commands to the canvas."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the canvas: description: "When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the cloned node."
dict.description: \"The margin between the cl: description: "The margin between the cloned node and the source node."
dict.description: \"The step size for expandi: description: "The step size for expanding the node."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the node po: description: "When enabled, the node popup will be disabled."
dict.description: \"When enabled, zooming wil: description: "When enabled, zooming will be disabled."
dict.description: \"When enabled, panning wil: description: "When enabled, panning will be disabled."
dict.description: \"Automatically resize the: description: "Automatically resize the height of a node to fit the content."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the auto re: description: "When enabled, the auto resize feature will be enabled by default for all nodes."
dict.description: \"The maximum height of the: description: "The maximum height of the node when auto resizing (-1 for unlimited)."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the height: description: "When enabled, the height of the node will snap to the grid."
dict.description: \"Group nodes can be collap: description: "Group nodes can be collapsed and expanded to keep the canvas organized."
dict.description: \"When enabled, a group tha: description: "When enabled, a group that is collapsed show its border while dragging a node."
dict.description: \"Focus on a single node an: description: "Focus on a single node and blur all other nodes."
dict.description: \"Create a presentation fro: description: "Create a presentation from your canvas."
dict.description: \"If turned off, you can st: description: "If turned off, you can still set the start node using the corresponding command."
dict.description: \"The default ratio of the: description: "The default ratio of the slide. For example, 16:9 is 1200x675 and 3:2 is 1350x900."
dict.description: \"The padding of the slide: description: "The padding of the slide when wrapping the canvas in a slide."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the viewpor: description: "When enabled, the viewport will be reset to the original position after the presentation ends."
dict.description: \"When enabled, you can use: description: "When enabled, you can use the arrow keys to change slides in presentation mode."
description: "When enabled, you can use the PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides in presentation mode (Makes the presentation mode compatible with most presentation remotes)."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the canvas: description: "When enabled, the canvas will zoom to the slide without padding."
dict.description: \"The duration of the slide: description: "The duration of the slide transition animation in seconds. Set to 0 to disable the animation."
dict.description: \"The intensity of the slid: description: "The intensity of the slide transition animation. The higher the value, the more the canvas will zoom out before zooming in on the next slide."
dict.description: \"Encapsulate a selection o: description: "Encapsulate a selection of nodes and edges into a new canvas."
dict.description: \"When enabled, the portal: description: "When enabled, the portal will maintain its size when closed."
dict.description: \"When enabled, edges into: description: "When enabled, edges into disabled portals will be shown."
dict.label: \"Always align new nodes to grid\: label: "Always align new nodes to grid"
dict.label: \"Disable font size relative to z: label: "Disable font size relative to zoom"
dict.label: \"Update edge style while draggin: label: "Update edge style while dragging (Can be very slow)"
dict.label: 'Rotate arrow if pathfinding meth: label: 'Rotate arrow if pathfinding method is "Direct"'
dict.label: 'Show \"Set Start Node\" in node: label: 'Show "Set Start Node" in node popup'
dict.label: \"Use arrow keys to change slides: label: "Use arrow keys to change slides"
dict.label: \"Use PgUp/PgDown keys to change: label: "Use PgUp/PgDown keys to change slides"
dict.Notice(\"No start node found. Please mar: Notice("No start node found. Please mark a node as a start node through the popup menu.")

dict.description: `Change the zoom breakpoint: description: `Change the zoom breakpoint (the zoom level at which the nodes won't render their content anymore) on a per-node basis using the ${VARIABLE_BREAKPOINT_CSS_VAR} CSS variable.`
dict.description: \"Flip the direction of edg: description: "Flip the direction of edges using the popup menu."
